clues.text: There's a bill in Merlin's inbox from the carpenter for this piece of furniture that seats 50
2007:George Clooney is the fixer for a law firm

Agrippa says of her, "Royal wench! She made great Caesar lay his sword to bed"

2000:Julia Roberts becomes a legal assistant & brings down a power company

It's the liquor you might drink while playing the card game of the same name

1996:Sports agent Tom Cruise has a moral epiphany

1996:Liam Neeson fights for Irish free rule

Endocrine or exocrine, for example

2008:Rich kid Anton Yelchin acts as a psychiatrist to his peers at his new school

A small cave, perhaps a "Blue" one

"Buy me some peanuts and Cracker Jack, I don't care if i never get back" in this song
clues.answer: "Take Me Out to the Ball Game"

clues.text: In 1973 William Rogers was replaced in this post by a German import

Song that starts, "When the night has come / and the land is dark / and the moon is the only light we'll see"
